validation.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address

Footer.description: Where luxury catering meets world-class culinary artistry.
Footer.newsletterDesc: Receive curated menus and exclusive offers.

Hero.tagline: Private Events • Corporate Catering • VIP Experiences

Services.title: Our Services
Services.description: From intimate gatherings to grand corporate galas, Tenx Catering delivers excellence in every detail.

corporate.title: Corporate Catering
corporate.description: Elevating business luncheons, board meetings, and executive events with a premium culinary touch.

private.title: Private Occasions
private.description: From intimate dinner parties to grand celebrations, tailored to your unique vision and taste.

weddings.title: Weddings
weddings.description: Timeless flavors for your special day, from the first cocktail to the final toast.

vip.title: VIP Premiere
vip.description: Unparalleled luxury featuring bespoke menus, rare ingredients, and world-class service.

HowItWorks.title: The Journey to Excellence
HowItWorks.description: A seamless path from curated selection to unforgettable celebration.

step1.title: Service Selection
step1.description: Choose from our Luxury, Premium, or Standard tiers to perfectly match your event's needs.

step2.title: Reserve Your Date
step2.description: Select your preferred date and venue. We handle every logistical detail from there.

step3.title: Curate Your Menu
step3.description: Partner with our chefs to finalize a menu that will enchant your guests.

step4.title: Secure Your Event
step4.description: Finalize your agreement and secure your booking through our seamless digital process.

SignatureMenus.title: Signature Menus
SignatureMenus.description: A culinary odyssey curated for every occasion.

VIP.title: The VIP
VIP.description: Designed for moments that demand the extraordinary. Our VIP service offers Michelin-star caliber chefs, bespoke menu curation, and white-glove service for your most significant occasions.

Chefs.title: Masters of the Kitchen
Chefs.description: Meet the artisans behind your next unforgettable meal.

Events.title: Unforgettable Occasions
Events.description: Recent highlights from the world of Tenx Catering.

Home.ctaTitle: Elevate Your Next Occasion Above the Ordinary
Home.ctaDescription: Experience the Tenx Catering distinction. Our team of world-class chefs and event specialists are ready to transform your vision into an unforgettable reality.
